title: Question:
author: blue Snow
created_time: June 23, 2022, 12:06:03 AMLast edit: August 17, 2024, 03:50:28 AM by blue Snow
content: Italy League (Serie A) season 2024/2025 star on 17 August 2024*Drop your favorite team in reply and don't forget pool on top.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: If Pogba is able in Juventus for this session, I believe the Juventus squad more get stronger than before and will be more competitive to scudetto against Milan and Inter. Pogba will be support Dusan, Morata and Dybala on front. He will support the half-back also. But only if he changes not to be selfish again. In between 2 weeks, Pogba will medical check-up with a free transfer and sign in 3 years contract. Is Pogba will be the same person in 2014?, Allegri is at his coach at that time.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Serie A next season looks like it will be very interesting, I hope Juventus lose their dominance again like a few seasons ago. Last season they could only be in 4th position with 70 points they got.Even so, it turns out that there are still many people who expect Juventus to win Serie A next season, we can see it from the OP's poll, LOL.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on June 24, 2022, 09:34:14 AMSerie A next season looks like it will be very interesting, I hope Juventus lose their dominance again like a few seasons ago. Last season they could only be in 4th position with 70 points they got.Even so, it turns out that there are still many people who expect Juventus to win Serie A next season, we can see it from the OP's poll, LOL.I choose them, I don't know who another 1, seems like you have a favorite Inter Milan, right?. We know in the last session Juventus did not reinforce Ronaldo who move to MU, so make their strength is reduced, and lost their prestige, which means unstable. But for the next session, I felt it was different Juventus is beginning to revive when Pogba is already in the squad, on another side, Dusan already found his best performance in Juventus, he was the soul of Ronaldo as a suitable substitute.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Serie A session 2022-2023 begins on 13th August, the match will be opened by defending champion AC Milan vs Udinese at San Siro stadium. The other big 4, Inter will face Lecce, Juventus vs Sassuolo, and Napoli vs Hellas Verona. In the club Europe zone, Lazio will face Bologna while Roma challenge Salernitana. I Think the big club will win easily when we look performance of the opponent, maybe only Lazio will have a tough fight because h2h in the last 3 matches Lazio only once win, while bologna 2.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Many people think a big match between Lazio and Napoli will balance and tough because both have the same statistic with 2 wins and a draw, but the bet still leaning toward Napoli because the last 2 matches they cleaned up the winning. H2H on the last 5 matches, Napoli far superior with 4 winnings. So, in the next match they have to care about the opponent, On Napoli's side, Lazio must keep Khvicha Kvaratskhelia to don't move in the forward area, because that winger is very high performance. while in Lazio side, Napoli must focus on Milinkovic to not move to the center area.

comments.author: LUCKMCFLY
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on September 03, 2022, 03:39:17 AMMany people think a big match between Lazio and Napoli will balance and tough because both have the same statistic with 2 wins and a draw, but the bet still leaning toward Napoli because the last 2 matches they cleaned up the winning. H2H on the last 5 matches, Napoli far superior with 4 winnings. So, in the next match they have to care about the opponent, On Napoli's side, Lazio must keep Khvicha Kvaratskhelia to don't move in the forward area, because that winger is very high performance. while in Lazio side, Napoli must focus on Milinkovic to not move to the center area.Well, seeing a match like this I would automatically go for Napoli, Napoli has had a lot of growth in recent seasons, in fact I think that even CR7 wanted to join this team, previously there was a very good goalkeeper who is the Colombian Ospina who is the best of the goalkeepers in Colombia, this team is somewhat quiet but when they decide to start they destroy any team that comes their way, I hope they can have a good run for now, because I think they are going to make some transfers and they want new players, no I know if his plans include accepting CR7 but it would not be bad, it would be a great contribution that he would give to the club.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: There are interesting things if we talk about the competitive map of the team that excels in the Italian League Serie A this season, we remember that in 2021 ago Inter Milan won the Serie A champion at that time, many question whether history will repeat itself for the Inter Milan team, of course it is still a mystery, but something that could happen considering Inter are still adding to their strength in the Italian league Serie A this season, seeing striker Romelu return from Chelsea.I also see AC Milan not standing still this season, adding strength to defend their title in the Italian league Serie A, By bringing in striker Divock from Liverpool, I believe that if Inter Milan & AC Milan met in the league this time, it could be something extraordinary in the Italian league this season.Napoli & Juventus also have to be wary of in the Italian Serie A league this season, overall these two teams are also a serious threat in the 2022/23 season, they are also doing the same thing to bring in the best players to defend in the league this season.For now, I can only conclude that these four teams, have a good chance in the Italian league Serie A this year.

comments.author: Doell
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on June 23, 2022, 12:06:03 AM*Drop your favorite team in reply and don't forget pool on top.My favorite team Napoli, also already voted. Last season Napoli also played consistently and managed to sit in 3rd place, so that qualifying for the champions league. This season the team performance is getting more on fire, even already beaten a strong team Liverpool with a lot goal score in UCL, probably be my favorite in every bet too. Even also Napoli won their last match against Milan.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Doell on September 25, 2022, 07:13:27 PMQuote from: blue Snow on June 23, 2022, 12:06:03 AM*Drop your favorite team in reply and don't forget pool on top.My favorite team Napoli, also already voted. Last season Napoli also played consistently and managed to sit in 3rd place, so that qualifying for the champions league. This season the team performance is getting more on fire, even already beaten a strong team Liverpool with a lot goal score in UCL, probably be my favorite in every bet too. Even also Napoli won their last match against Milan.Total voters is still 4 people, Napoli has 1 voter which I admit is you, another voter is Inter and Juventus which one of them is me. So until this session is over, we have much time to guess. Napoli is enough consistent where got the winning versus Milan, They have the same point with Atalanta. but they have to actually worry with Udinese where have 5 winning in the row

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: I Haven't heard anything about Jose Mourinho for a long time after got fired from as Roma on January ago, the last time I saw him on motoGP Portugal. I heard issue He has been linked with many big clubs in the Arabian league, but but he doesn't want go to Arab because he still feels at home in Italy and just wants to train Italy club. So what do you thing?, Are there still Italy clubs that want to accept the service?, because even he was have quite talented as a coach, but he couldn't control his mouth and manners well so that make the official situation so uncomfortable.

comments.author: Distraction
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on March 26, 2024, 01:04:23 AMI Haven't heard anything about Jose Mourinho for a long time after got fired from as Roma on January ago, the last time I saw him on motoGP Portugal. I heard issue He has been linked with many big clubs in the Arabian league, but but he doesn't want go to Arab because he still feels at home in Italy and just wants to train Italy club. So what do you thing?, Are there still Italy clubs that want to accept the service?, because even he was have quite talented as a coach, but he couldn't control his mouth and manners well so that make the official situation so uncomfortable. Mourinho is actually very keen on returning to his job at a team soon. He was interviewed by Fabrizio Romano some days ago and here is the video to that on official Fabrizio Romano YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RvBecycojoMourinho was linked with Napoli once but the rumours dropped a short time later. Now they are spreading rumours such as he can be Milan's next manager. However I don't think it will happen either. Mourinho should choose his next team wisely. He has a traditional system depending on defending. Milan are rather an attacking team as you know.  Mourinho rejected Saudi Arabia offer once while he was managing Roma. But now maybe he could find that option reasonable for himself, what do you think?

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: the first week of the Italian Serie A League 2024/2025 will present the match between Genos vs Inter Milan. Of course, Inter Milan will be favored to win because as the defending champion, Inter Milan also has a capable squad with a better lineup than Genoa, so far the odds are more inclined to inter Milan with has 63% to win. But inter milan squad should be noted because they never have won (2 last match) versus Genoa on Luigi Ferraris stadium. there is a possibility that it will be repeated in the opening match of this season if Inter Milan is not focused about that.

comments.author: Catenaccio
comments.body: Quote from: Distraction on March 31, 2024, 11:02:19 AMMourinho is actually very keen on returning to his job at a team soon. He was interviewed by Fabrizio Romano some days ago and here is the video to that on official Fabrizio Romano YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_RvBecycojoMourinho was linked with Napoli once but the rumours dropped a short time later. Now they are spreading rumours such as he can be Milan's next manager. However I don't think it will happen either. Mourinho should choose his next team wisely. He has a traditional system depending on defending. Milan are rather an attacking team as you know.  Serie A is not a favorite league with Mourinho and so far he has managed clubs in Portuguese League, Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and only two big leagues in Europe he has yet experienced, Bundesliga and Ligue 1. Ligue 1 seems to be not attractive with Mourinho and Bundesliga is only above Ligue 1 a little bit.His main target recent years is a coach position of Portugal national team and I believe he will continue to add a special term in his contracts with any club in future, that he will be free to end the contract to take a job from Portugal national team. Milan, Inter Milan or Napoli might not be favorite destinations for Mourinho in next one or two years.QuoteMourinho rejected Saudi Arabia offer once while he was managing Roma. But now maybe he could find that option reasonable for himself, what do you think?Mourinho rejected offers from clubs in Saudi Arabia a few times and it seems he is not interested in that league and money there. It can be changed when he becomes older and feels like he has very last years for coach management job, he might take a good offer from clubs in Saudi Professional League, to get an extra big money for retirement.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on August 17, 2024, 04:06:01 AMthe first week of the Italian Serie A League 2024/2025 will present the match between Genos vs Inter Milan. Of course, Inter Milan will be favored to win because as the defending champion, Inter Milan also has a capable squad with a better lineup than Genoa, so far the odds are more inclined to inter Milan with has 63% to win. But inter milan squad should be noted because they never have won (2 last match) versus Genoa on Luigi Ferraris stadium. there is a possibility that it will be repeated in the opening match of this season if Inter Milan is not focused about that.It was a tough and interesting match as both teams scored two goals each. Thuram scored both goals, as he scored one in the first half to equalize the goal scored by Vogliacco ten minutes later. Thuram was able to score a brilliant goal on 82nd minutes to put Inter on the lead.Unfortunately, Besseck handball inside Inter box stole all three points from Inter as a penalty was given and it was an opportunity for Genoa to equalize the second goal scored by Thuram. Messias scored the penalty for Genoa on the 90+5 minutes with a rebound after Inter goalie stopped the penalty from entering the post.The defending champions were unable to secure a win in their first match, it shows that they might not be able to defend the title.Genoa 2-2 Inter.

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on August 17, 2024, 04:06:01 AMthe first week of the Italian Serie A League 2024/2025 will present the match between Genos vs Inter Milan. Of course, Inter Milan will be favored to win because as the defending champion, Inter Milan also has a capable squad with a better lineup than Genoa, so far the odds are more inclined to inter Milan with has 63% to win. But inter milan squad should be noted because they never have won (2 last match) versus Genoa on Luigi Ferraris stadium. there is a possibility that it will be repeated in the opening match of this season if Inter Milan is not focused about that.The result of the match between Genoa and Inter Milan was a draw, this inaugural match showed that indeed Genoa could cannibalize the score made by Inter Milan, although in terms of play and statistics Inter Milan dominated far more than Genoa. Unfortunately the hand ball that occurred in the Inter Milan defense and was the last minute of the second half made Inter Milan lose, Marcus Thuram added a second goal from a failed penalty rebound.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: topbitcoin on August 17, 2024, 09:52:41 PMQuote from: blue Snow on August 17, 2024, 04:06:01 AMthe first week of the Italian Serie A League 2024/2025 will present the match between Genos vs Inter Milan. Of course, Inter Milan will be favored to win because as the defending champion, Inter Milan also has a capable squad with a better lineup than Genoa, so far the odds are more inclined to inter Milan with has 63% to win. But inter milan squad should be noted because they never have won (2 last match) versus Genoa on Luigi Ferraris stadium. there is a possibility that it will be repeated in the opening match of this season if Inter Milan is not focused about that.The result of the match between Genoa and Inter Milan was a draw, this inaugural match showed that indeed Genoa could cannibalize the score made by Inter Milan, although in terms of play and statistics Inter Milan dominated far more than Genoa. Unfortunately the hand ball that occurred in the Inter Milan defense and was the last minute of the second half made Inter Milan lose, Marcus Thuram added a second goal from a failed penalty rebound.This match gives us an answer if Inter always never wins at Genoa's home. Genoa instead gave us a surprise when made the first goal on minute 20. it's always tradition if depending champion does not always create a win in the first match. Maybe because Inter are looking for new strategies and situations so that it is not easy for opponents to read like previous session, and I think it's normal, but if Inter continues like this in the next match, I think the trophy for this session they won't take it again. Thuram was be hero for inter fans tonight, while Messias became very hated fans when he equalized the score.

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on August 18, 2024, 04:13:47 AMQuote from: topbitcoin on August 17, 2024, 09:52:41 PMQuote from: blue Snow on August 17, 2024, 04:06:01 AMthe first week of the Italian Serie A League 2024/2025 will present the match between Genos vs Inter Milan. Of course, Inter Milan will be favored to win because as the defending champion, Inter Milan also has a capable squad with a better lineup than Genoa, so far the odds are more inclined to inter Milan with has 63% to win. But inter milan squad should be noted because they never have won (2 last match) versus Genoa on Luigi Ferraris stadium. there is a possibility that it will be repeated in the opening match of this season if Inter Milan is not focused about that.The result of the match between Genoa and Inter Milan was a draw, this inaugural match showed that indeed Genoa could cannibalize the score made by Inter Milan, although in terms of play and statistics Inter Milan dominated far more than Genoa. Unfortunately the hand ball that occurred in the Inter Milan defense and was the last minute of the second half made Inter Milan lose, Marcus Thuram added a second goal from a failed penalty rebound.This match gives us an answer if Inter always never wins at Genoa's home. Genoa instead gave us a surprise when made the first goal on minute 20. it's always tradition if depending champion does not always create a win in the first match. Maybe because Inter are looking for new strategies and situations so that it is not easy for opponents to read like previous session, and I think it's normal, but if Inter continues like this in the next match, I think the trophy for this session they won't take it again. Thuram was be hero for inter fans tonight, while Messias became very hated fans when he equalized the score.I also think that maybe this is nothing but a curse for Inter Milan, but if you look further, the thoughts as you expressed may be true too, they are trying new strategies and doing some experiments so that the results released in matches like this are not optimal, some other suspicions such as Inter Milan playing masks in the first match are also revelations that cannot be considered wrong this time, because it could be like that. But it would indeed be very disappointing if Inter Milan were really made helpless by Genoa and his ability is just like that, I also think he will not get it again this season, but you have to calm down, it's early in the season, there is still plenty of time to make better changes.

comments.author: Distraction
comments.body: We don't see Osimhen anywhere in the match right now. He isn't injured, right? It must be all about their intention to sell him as soon as possible. I don't know if there is any progress in talks with Chelsea. The most recent rumours have been like to sell him to Chelsea in return for Lukaku + cash. Lukaku is a striker who Conte wants to see now.I don't know why Napoli isn't looking for better strikers but anyway.    Lukaku has had a good chemistry with the Serie A. It is the truth. But let's see how this will end. Chelsea also wants to get rid of Lukaku as you know.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: The bad result has never won in 4 matches, making De Rossi get fired and replaced by Ivan Juric. As we know, Ivan Juric is not a new name on Serie A. He has been an assistant to big coaches and clubs, and the last one he coached Torino. But on the first time as roma coach, he will face the most difficult challenges, he will concoct a brilliant strategy to face the a rising team Udinese. from the game side, Udinese is looks superior than Roma, they were even able to beat parma at home and never have lost in their 4 matches, while Roma instead humiliated by empoli at their home, and never have won on their 4 matches. the match against Udinese is a form of proof Ivan Juric, if he able to beat udinese, maybe his name will be taken for the next match.
